eventDataList.eventdesc: A quarterly meeting of all university alumni
An annual gathering of Summit old students.

eventDataList.eventTitle: Stakeholders' Open House and Account of Stewardship.
eventDataList.eventdesc: An annual report to give stewardship of all the activities embarked by the bureau

faqDataList.faqTitle: I want to make a gift. How can I give? Whom do I call?
faqDataList.faqDesc: You have a number of options.  You may make your gift via a credit card on this website, call our hotline on -234-802-735-2041, or mail us at info@suab.org.

faqDataList.faqTitle: Is there a limit to how much (or little) I can give online?
faqDataList.faqDesc: There is no limit to how much (or little) you can give online.

faqDataList.faqTitle: How do you choose the projects that you raise funds for?
faqDataList.faqDesc: Our fundraising campaigns are for projects that have philanthropic appeal and are integral to the delivery of the University's strategic plan.
